metadata.feature_description: Receive notifications for various activity stream events

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed > Messages > Notifications tab
steps.actual: Notifications tab found in Messages page showing 4 notifications with content (Comment awaiting approval, Post approval request, etc.)

steps.expected: Notification details should show sender, subject, and action buttons
steps.actual: Notifications displayed with details including sender info, approval/reject buttons, and dismiss option

steps.action: Click the X (dismiss) button on an individual notification
steps.expected: The notification should be dismissed and removed from the list
steps.actual: Notification was dismissed successfully, count changed from 4 to 3

steps.action: Click the Approve button on a post approval notification
steps.expected: The notification should be processed and removed from list
steps.actual: Clicking Approve on the Post Approval notification processed it successfully, count changed from 3 to 2
Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to dismiss all notifications?'
All notifications were cleared, notification count is now 0

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed and identify posts with Subscribe links
steps.expected: Posts should show Subscribe/Unsubscribe toggle links
steps.actual: Activity Feed posts display Subscribe or Unsubscribe links based on current subscription status

steps.action: Click Subscribe link on an unsubscribed post
steps.expected: The Subscribe link should change to Unsubscribe
steps.actual: Clicking Subscribe successfully changed the link to Unsubscribe, indicating subscription was created

steps.action: Click Unsubscribe link on a subscribed post
steps.expected: The Unsubscribe link should change back to Subscribe
steps.actual: Clicking Unsubscribe successfully changed the link back to Subscribe, indicating unsubscription was successful

observations: Notifications are displayed in the Messages > Notifications tab within the Activity Feed/Profile area
The notification system uses DNN Core Services (NotificationsController.Instance) for notification management
Code in ActivityStreamNotifications.cs shows notifications are sent for new posts (NewPostNotifications) and new comments (NewCommentNotifications)
Users are automatically subscribed to posts when they comment on them (line 211 of ActivityStreamNotifications.cs)
Notification types include PostNotificationTypeName and CommentNotificationTypeName
Subscribe/Unsubscribe toggles work via AJAX calls without page reload
Notification preferences configuration UI was not found in the tested area - code suggests subscription is handled at the post level rather than a global notification preferences panel
Testing notification delivery for specific events (comment notification, like notification, user mention notification) would require a second user account to verify cross-user notification delivery
